headline: Want Decades of Passive Income? 3 Stocks to Buy Now and Hold Forever
summary: Generating long-term passive income is easier than you might think.  Here are three stocks to buy now and hold forever for a lifetime of dividends.  AbbVie (NYSE: ABBV) is a Dividend King, with 52 consecutive years of dividend increases.
